title: Ensure Updates, Patches, and Additional Security Software

controls.title: Ensure system-wide crypto policy is not legacy
controls.description: Ensure updates patches and additional security software are installed.
controls.rationale: Periodically patches are released for included software either due to security flaws or to include additional functionality.
controls.audit:
Run the following command to verify there are no updates or patches to install:
# dnf check-update
controls.remediation:
Run the following command to update the system:
# dnf update

v8: 7.1 Establish and Maintain a Vulnerability Management Process
v7: 3.4 Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools
